title: Repeat Strings in Python
description: In this challenge, you will implement a function that repeats a given string a specified number of times.

meta.title: Python String Repetition | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to use the * operator in Python to repeat a string a certain number of times, with examples and exercises to practice.
meta.keywords: Python, string repetition, programming tutorials, coding exercises, text manipulation
